newProducts.title: Google ADK-Go

newProducts.title: GibsonAI Memori
newProducts.description: Open-source memory engine specifically designed for LLMs, AI agents, and multi-agent systems to maintain context and state

newProducts.title: Microsoft Call Center AI
newProducts.description: AI agent system that enables programmatic phone calls through API calls, demonstrating autonomous agent capabilities

newProducts.title: Claude Advanced Tool Use

whitelistUpdates.title: Cursor 2.1 Release
whitelistUpdates.description: Latest version featuring Improved Plan Mode, AI Code Review in Editor, and Instant Grep functionality

whitelistUpdates.title: Series D Funding and $1B ARR Milestone
whitelistUpdates.description: Cursor raised $2.3B in Series D funding and passed $1B in annualized revenue

whitelistUpdates.title: PR Merge Impact Study
whitelistUpdates.description: New study finds companies merge 39% more PRs after Cursor's agent became default

whitelistUpdates.title: Semantic Search Performance Improvement
whitelistUpdates.description: Semantic search improves coding agent performance with 12.5% higher accuracy

whitelistUpdates.title: Continue v1.5.14 Stable Release
whitelistUpdates.description: Direct stable release from main branch with 121 commits since previous release

whitelistUpdates.title: CLI Beta Updates (Multiple)
whitelistUpdates.description: Series of CLI beta releases from November 21-25, 2025 with ongoing improvements

insights.title: Claude Advanced Tool Use and Opus 4.5
insights.description: Anthropic's latest updates include advanced tool use capabilities for Claude and the release of Opus 4.5, described as potentially the best model in the world for coding tasks.
insights.author: Anthropic

insights.title: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max Released
insights.description: OpenAI's new model specifically designed for coding tasks with compaction capabilities, representing the latest advancement in code generation technology.
insights.author: OpenAI

insights.title: Agent Design is Hard - Abstraction Challenges
insights.description: Recent discussion highlighting that current abstractions in agent design may not be worth adopting yet, suggesting the field is still evolving rapidly.
insights.author: Simon Willison

insights.title: LLM-CSEC: Security Evaluation of AI-Generated Code
insights.description: Academic paper providing empirical evaluation of security aspects in C/C++ code generated by Large Language Models, addressing critical safety concerns in AI-assisted coding.
insights.author: Multiple Researchers

insights.title: Learning to Debug: LLM-Organized Knowledge Trees
insights.description: Research on using LLMs to organize knowledge trees for solving RTL assertion failures, demonstrating advanced debugging capabilities using AI.
insights.author: Academic Researchers

insights.title: Google's ADK-Go for AI Agents
insights.description: Google released a code-first Go toolkit specifically designed for building AI agents, representing a new approach to agent development infrastructure.
insights.author: Google

insights.title: LightRAG: Simple and Fast RAG Implementation
insights.description: Open-source retrieval-augmented generation framework gaining traction for its simplicity and performance in AI applications.
insights.author: HKUDS Research Team

insights.title: Memori: Open-Source Memory Engine for LLMs
insights.description: New open-source memory engine designed specifically for Large Language Models, addressing persistent memory challenges in AI applications.
insights.author: GibsonAI

insights.title: Microsoft Call Center AI Agent API
insights.description: Microsoft's release of an AI agent API specifically designed for phone call interactions, showing practical applications of voice-capable AI agents.
insights.author: Microsoft

insights.title: Future of Programming with AI - Podcast Discussion
insights.description: Recent podcast episode featuring the Cursor Team discussing the future of programming with AI, providing insights into how AI is reshaping software development.
insights.author: Cursor Team
